title: MLB mock draft 3.0: Kiley McDaniel predicts the first two rounds
description: The MLB draft is Sunday! And this year, the drama starts with the Washington Nationals at the No. 1 pick.
author: Kiley McDaniel

title: Turner: Move to Bucks about 'staying competitive'
description: Myles Turner said a big factor from leaving the Pacers to sign with the Bucks was about "staying competitive."
author: Michael Wright

title: 'It'll be a chess match' - where Wimbledon final will be won
description: In her latest BBC Sport column at Wimbledon, Naomi Broady analyses where Saturday's final between Amanda Anisimova and Iga Swiatek will be won and lost.

title: 'Making up for what he lost, Archer's time is now'
description: An almost instant impact after over four years out - Jofra Archer is making up for lost time in Test cricket, writes Stephan Shemilt.

title: Forest consider Gibbs-White's Spurs switch off for now and consult lawyers over move
description: Nottingham Forest consider Morgan Gibbs-White's proposed move to Tottenham to be off for now, Sky Sports News has been told, while Forest consult their lawyers over potential legal action.

title: Horner sacked by Red Bull
description: Christian Horner has been sacked as Red Bull team principal with immediate effect after 20 years in charge of the Formula 1 team.

title: Rangers' Bruce Bochy Reacts to Jacob deGrom Decision on Friday
description: Texas Rangers manager Bruce Bochy reacted to Jacob deGrom's decision on Friday.

title: Warriors Emerge Among Favorites to Sign Veteran Guard in Offseason
description: The Golden State Warriors have been named among the favorites to sign a veteran point guard in free agency this offseason.
